verses.name: James 1:6
verses.text: But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed.

verses.name: James 1:7
verses.text: For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord.

verses.name: James 1:8
verses.text: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways.

verses.name: James 1:9
verses.text: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted:

verses.name: James 1:10
verses.text: But the rich, in that he is made low: because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away.
